name: Flaiser
description:
Flaiser is a top-down, board-puzzle, matching game where the player flips a whole row horizontally or vertically instead of only one piece at a time. In order to complete a level the player has to match the play board patterns. 

The game features 3 difficulty modes each having 15 levels to complete, making up for a total of 45 levels. In addition to that the game also have an infinity mode for the players that want to keep on playing. A 3 star rating system is there for the the true perfectionist and is based on how many turns you take to complete a level.

Flaiser is developed as part of a school project by 5 students. The game is meant as a casual and relaxing player experience. We hope you like it.
